metadata.title: CVE-2015-8833 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in the create_smp_dialog function ingtk-dialog.c in the Off-the-Record Messaging (OTR) pidgin-otr plugin before4.0.2 for Pidgin allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code viavectors related to the "Authenticate buddy" menu item.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8833` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pidgin-otr - 4.0.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pidgin-otr package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.2-1').
